title: Rek'Sai Tp/Smite Top?And build.
body: Would a Tp Smite top Rek'Sai work? I plan on building boots, tri-force, BoTRK, saber with Cinderhulk and tank from there. Could any of you Rek'sai mains also give advice on when I should build tri-force or black cleaver and BoTRK or hydra?

replies.body:
Honestly Rek'sai is someone that probably wants a few tank stats a bit earlier, but given your premise you'd want a build like.

Black Cleaver > BotRK/Hydra > Cinderhulk > Randuins/Warmogs/Banshies > Whatever you need of before.

Black Cleaver is basically an essential item for someone like rek'sai because she scales hard off the CDR and armor shred (Your Q is AoE and your E is true damage) and because league of tanks exists (if the enemy team somehow picks a squishy team comp then go triforce)

Hydra is better for spliting, while BotRK is better for dueling, this is kinda a your pick.

As for boots, you want one of Armor/MR/Swiftness for your boots, pick MR against heavy CC comps and Armor against mostly AD/auto comps, otherwise pick swiftness.

And always, if your starting to fall behind, don't go straight damage.

Also never ever use your TP to get back to lane after you are 6, have tunnels setup and use them, TP is for ganking.
I keep seeing this. Why? she is an all in champion that is meant to 1v1 with fast auto attack, why be a tank, just pick a tank meta champion and pwn.

Because you do damage while still building tank?

Also because you want to be able to teamfight.
Ok. So what's your opinion on how I should play top lane Rek'Sai?
